item.title: Flooding because of uneven road, 23rd October
item.description:
Causes problems with suspension of cars driving on it, not to mention flooding. This has been like this for YEARS !!

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Merton Gardens, Petts Wood, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: The metal rails on Thame road near the Mercedes repair shop, 23rd October
item.description:
Again there has been accident recently on Thames Road and the metal central rail has been totally damaged and requires to be replaced. Also it has been noticed that school students are on walking on the centre of the carriageway along the metal railings towards the crossing, some have hear plugs or headset over there ears. This can be and is very dangerous as they are not able to hear on coming traffic from behind, one day someone will get injured or killed, also would it not worth having the speed notice and the flashing display if you are driving over the speed limit for Thames Road? As some drivers thinks it’s a race track and a public road, can it be suggested to monitor the speed of vehicles
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Thames Road, Barnes Cray, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Branch Hill, 23rd October
item.description:
THis was report last night, reference number 8327906. The report was closed because it was deemed to be not on a public highway. This is incorrect. Branch Hill is a public highway, therefore the report should not have been closed. Please investigate and fix the problem. Thanks.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Branch Hill, West Hampstead, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: The Ballard that near the law courts/ town car park, 23rd October
item.description:
The Ballard near the law courts/town car park requires to be inspected and reposition as it leaning, can l suggest that instead of a black post it’s changed to a yellow hi/viz so that’s it’s more visible to all road users
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Highland Road, Barnehurst, London

item.title: Big sofa and white mattress dumped on Woolwich New Road-outside Woolwich Baptist church, 23rd October
item.description:
Hello team, please send someone to remove big sofa and white mattress dumped on Woolwich New Road facing Woolwich Baptist church It’s been there over a week and appreciate if these can be removed. They are blocking the pavement which pedestrians walk on. Thanks

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Sandy Hill Road, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: The drain cover near house number 21 Beverley Road has dro, 23rd October
item.description:
The drain cover has drop below street level and can cause damage to a vehicles that drive over the sunken drain cover. This matter has been reported before and still no repair to the drain has been done. Regards
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Beverley Road, Barnehurst, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: 152 Broadhurst Gardens, 23rd October
item.description:
The is a sharp decline in the road and then a sharp rise a few meters later which is causing the heavier vehicles such as buses and trucks to bounce and cause a shake to my property that is causing nausea and stress. The road needs to be evened out over this area to prevent this bouncing of heavy vehicles.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 154, Broadhurst Gardens, South Hampstead, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Damaged paving, 23rd October
item.description:
There is alot of damaged paving roughly between numbers 40-70 are all cracked and some raised which will be a trip hazard and quite dangerous. There is a hydrant and the paving around this has sunk, this is outside 59, please can this paving be inspected. The other side of the road has recently been repaired.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Westwood Lane, Falconwood, London
Report on FixMyStreet
